title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: Amazon Essentials Women's Long Sleeve Classic Wrap Dress (Available in Plus Size)

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #1,767 in Our Brands ( See Top 100 in Our Brands ) #106 in Women's Casual Dresses

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress well-made with decently thick fabric that feels wonderful, and appreciate its flattering wrap style that's not too dressy. The dress is comfortable and offers good value for money, with one customer noting it hides figure flaws. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it awesome while others say the arms are too tight for the size. The fabric weight is also mixed, with some appreciating its weight while others find it hangs too heavily. Select to learn more Quality Style Fabric thickness Flattering Comfort Value for money Fit Fabric weight 87 customers mention "Quality" 83 positive 4 negative Customers find the dress well-made, with one customer noting it's a steal for its quality. "I wore this to a wedding. Great dress at a great price, flattering even as maternity. Washed well. Very opaque and good thick fabric...." items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: This dress is such a timeless piece and great quality for the price. I bought it in burgundy and the color is absolutely beautiful. It is incredibly flattering, smooths and hides imperfections, and the material is both comfortable and well-made. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed!
items.body: For the price, I wasn't expecting much but this is actually a great dress! The fabric is thick. I love the huddeb button at the waist to help keep the skirt in place. I'm 5' and it hits just above my knee which is perfect for me, but if you're taller, it may be shorter than you'd like. I ordered medium which is my usual size and it fits great! Read more
items.author: Kristen Peterson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks like you paid much more!!
items.body: This dress is adorable and the weight of the material is perfect--won't be flying up in the wind!! The only reason I rated it 4 stars instead of 5 is because it is tight in the arms--it does stretch, but fits snug. The wrap style is very flattering, but if you are larger in the bust area, size up for coverage. Love the Burgundy color--perfect for Fall. Read more
items.author: Deb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy dress worth the price.
items.body: This was nicer than expected. True to size. Nice length, material was better than expected for the price. Looks expensive. Read more
items.author: Alexa Brocklehurst

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Long
items.body: Im 5’5 and 160 lbs with large breasts. The top fits nicely and the dress is good quality but very long. So long. Read more
items.author: Tara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars If there’s such a thing as the perfect dress, this is it!
items.body: What a great dress for this price point! The dress is beautifully designed and crafted. It is an actual wrap dress and the coverage is perfect! The bust is designed for a modest look - not overly conservative but not overly revealing either. The ruching on the skirt is the perfect tummy coverage and the fabric is durable, not flimsy or see through. Easy to put on and take off and perfect for the office, after 5 or church. Read more
items.author: Deborah F

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheaply made!
items.body: Runs small and cheaply made. Returning right away… when I tried it on, you can see my skin through the belt hole on the side. Don’t waste your time buying this! Read more
items.author: Jens

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, comfortable and affordable
items.body: Best dress that I bought in a long time! Fits great!! Super comfortable and amazing price! Read more
items.author: Jennifer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Burgundy, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
